snippet: The rookie defenseman Adam Larsson sparked the Devils in his playoff debut with a game-tying goal in Tuesday’s Game 2 victory in Philadelphia.
abstract: New Jersey Devils rookie defenseman Adam Larsson plays like a veteran in Devils 4-1 playoff win over Philadelphia Flyers in Game 2 of their NHL playoff series.
lead_paragraph: The rookie defenseman Adam Larsson sparked the Devils in his playoff debut with a game-tying goal in Tuesday’s Game 2 victory in Philadelphia.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoff Debut a Prickly Success for Adam Larsson and Devils
headline.main: Devils’ Rookie Defenseman Regains His Edge
headline.print_headline: A Devils Rookie Regains His Edge
